availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Withrow (Franklin County, Kentucky, merchant's clerk and clerk)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, merchant's clerk and clerk. Pennsylvania native. Married to Alice Johnson Withrow in Franklin County, Kentucky, on August 1, 1861. Father of Jamie M. Withrow. Merchant's clerk in Franklin County in 1850. Clerk in Franklin County in 1860. Clerk in Franklin County in 1863. Clerk in Franklin County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 53B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 279.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 115B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Franklin County, KY, July 1863, p. 27.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994034, Franklin County Marriages, p. 18 of 29 of microfilm.
"James M. Withrow (1835-1905)," Find A Grave, Memorial 59714288, accessed January 30, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59714288.
KYR-0001-004-0497.
